name: Zombie Room Escape
description:
Zombie Room Escape

We are in a room with zombies and we can finish the game by killing all the zombies in this room. The game does not have much purpose, it is just a game where bored people can spend time. It's short-lived and has some areas for you to explore.

Minimum System Requirements: https://www.aryagames.tk/2021/08/zombie-room-escape.html
